articles.title: Death toll from Indonesia landslip rises to 53
articles.summary: The death toll from a landslip on Indonesia's main island of Java a week ago rose to 53 on Saturday (January 31, 2026), a rescue official said, with 10 people still missing. ALSO WATCH Watch: Indonesia grapples with deadly West Java landslide amid heavy rains An intense downpour triggered the landslip that hit Pasirlangu village, in an area southeast of the capital Jakarta, damaging more than 50 houses and displacing about 650 people.
